data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Serchhip. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Serchhip, Mizoram, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Serchhip, Mizoram, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Serchhip, Mizoram, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Serchhip.
Spirit, I pray that the Chakma people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Serchhip, Mizoram, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 714 believers in Serchhip and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the county of Serchhip, Mizoram, India has a population of 64,900.

We estimate Serchhip has 714 people who might know Jesus, 787 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 63,399 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Serchhip. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;
